entries.text: {'domain': 'Mental Well-being', 'rule': 'Consciously reflect on your inner state daily to manage anxieties.', 'generalized': "Regularly examine one's thoughts and feelings is essential for emotional regulation."}

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: {'domain': 'Communication & Relationships', 'rule': 'Listen attentively and respond thoughtfully to those who depend on you.', 'generalized': 'When offering support or guidance, ensure active listening and considerate response.'}

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: {'domain': 'Creative Process', 'rule': 'Avoid rushing creative work; the quality of the output suffers when haste replaces careful consideration.', 'generalized': 'Creative endeavors thrive on deliberate pacing and attention to detail; haste compromises quality.'}

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

aggregated_from.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)
